snippet.title: Cap'n Marcela Parrot Charmer - Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Cap'n Marcela Parrot Charmer Walkthrough by Carmel Games
0:47 - take hook
0:59 - take coconut
1:08 - take vanilla flower
1:23 - use coconut
1:33 - take telescope
1:36 - take money
1:41 - riddle solution

2:02 - buy lime
2:20 - buy book

2:46 - use hook
3:00 - use telescope
3:28 - use book
4:07 - use lime, vanilla and cachaça
4:13 - get cocktail
4:25 - use cocktail, get rum
4:53 - take fishing rod
5:05 - use fishing rod, get rotten shellfish
5:15 - use rum and rotten shellfish, get potion
5:31 - use potion
